thread.title: Claressa Shields suspended from fighting in Michigan after marijuana test, report says
thread.title_full: Claressa Shields suspended from fighting in Michigan after marijuana test, report says

author: @WNEMTV5news
title: Claressa Shields suspended from fighting in Michigan after marijuana test, report says
text:
Published: Feb. 20, 2025 at 5:41 PM EST | Updated: seconds ago Email This Link
Share on Facebook
Share on X (formerly Twitter)
Share on Pinterest
Share on LinkedIn
Boxing champion Claressa Shields has been suspended from fighting in Michigan and is under investigation after testing for marijuana, according to a report from Reuters. Sports
